title: Word: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) â€“ Start a new document using up to three files
description: No need to start from scratch. Copilot can create your new document based on three different Word or PowerPoint files. In "Draft with Copilot," select Reference a file and choose up to three files that Copilot should use when creating the new document. Or, in "Compose," type "/" and the name of the file you'd like to use.  You can only use files you have permission to access in your organization's SharePoint or OneDrive.
